articles.title: In memoriam: Nikki Giovanni, renowned poet, activist, and Virginia Tech legend - Virginia Tech
articles.description: Many Hokies can attest to the power of Giovanni’s words - both spoken and written. She is known around the world for her poetry, essays, and written work that delve into social issues, such as race and gender, and call for action.
articles.content:
When she retired, she said she would miss talking with Virginia Tech students regularly. Her ultimate goal as a professor was to teach students to think deeply and ask questions.
I want my students … [+4439 chars]

articles.author: David Shepardson, Nora Eckert
articles.title: GM to exit loss-making Cruise robotaxi business - Reuters
articles.description: General Motors said on Tuesday it will end robotaxi development at its majority-owned, money-losing Cruise business, a blow to the ambitions of the largest U.S. automaker which had made the advanced technology unit a top priority.

articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: Startup will brick $800 emotional support robot for kids without refunds - Ars Technica
articles.description: Embodied says it will try to refund recent purchases but makes no promises.

articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Spotify has disabled Car Thing streaming devices - TechCrunch
articles.description: Spotify has officially discontinued Car Thing, its in-car streaming device, with all units now disabled, the company confirmed to TechCrunch.  Spotify has officially discontinued Car Thing, its in-car streaming device, with all units now disabled.
